subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Over the last 99 years of their rivalry with the Yankees, the Red Sox had yet to win as many as six in a row, until the early hours of Friday morning of a game held up by a lengthy rain delay.
snippet: Over the last 99 years of their rivalry with the Yankees, the Red Sox had yet to win as many as six in a row, until the early hours of Friday morning of a game held up by a lengthy rain delay.
